sections.Description (verbatim):
You are at the top of Aragain Falls, an enormous waterfall with a drop of about 450 feet. The only path here is on the north end.
A solid rainbow spans the Falls.
Hidden/conditional transitions: Rainbow bridge exists only if sceptre has been waved at [[Z1 - Canyon Bottom]]
Key parser interactions: CROSS RAINBOW → direct transition to [[Z1 - End of Rainbow]] (bypasses [[Z1 - On the Rainbow]] node)
